title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and contact information.

title: Rust MNIST
description: A Rust implementation of the MNIST digit recognition task. Implemented basic machine learning modules in Rust and imported weights from a pretrained model.

title: Sari: A 3D Convenience Store Synthetic Environment for Agent Learning
description: A 3D synthetic environment designed for training AI agents. Developed using Unity and Blender, it provides a realistic setting for agent learning experiments in the scene of retail environments.
